title: Breakups 101: Tips to Help a Broken Heart
description:
Ever found yourself sitting on the floor, listening to an emotional Taylor Swift song, and asking yourself, ‘What do I do with all this hurt?’ If so, it sounds like you have experienced some heartbreak in your life, sister. And while T. Swift is a great remedy for initial stages of the hurt – you’ll soon find yourself asking what to do next. And when that chapter comes around, because it always does, this episode has just what you need to navigate the healing of your heart after it’s been broken. In this episode, you’ll learn how to re-calibrate after rejection, crack your comfort zone to pursue your calling, and find purpose from that aching pain. Whether it’s a romantic relationship coming undone or a close friendship growing apart, you’re not alone, friend. So just one more time, cue up Picture to Burn and then give this episode a listen to truly begin your path of healing.

@jordanleedooley

@shepodcast

Episode Details: http://jordanleedooley.com/breakups-101-tips-to-help-a-broken-heart

Soul Scripts Store: https://shop.thesoulscripts.com/collections/gifts

Bootcamp Link: https://jordanleedooley.com/bootcamp

The SHE Podcast is a part of the Lasting Media network of podcasts. To learn more visit lastingmediagroup.com
author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
